mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM food f LEFT JOIN city c ON f.city_id = c.id WHERE f.del_flag = 0
AND f.city_id = #{cityId}
AND f.is_recommend = #{isRecommend}
AND f.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND f.food_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{foodType}, '%')
AND ( c.province = #{province} OR c.province = CONCAT(#{province}, '市') OR c.province = CONCAT(#{province}, '省') OR c.province = CONCAT(#{province}, '自治区') OR c.province = CONCAT(#{province}, '特别行政区') OR c.province LIKE CONCAT(#{province}, '%') OR #{province} LIKE CONCAT(c.province, '%') OR REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(c.province, '市', ''), '省', ''), '自治区', ''), '特别行政区', '') = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(#{province}, '市', ''), '省', ''), '自治区', ''), '特别行政区', '') )
AND ( c.city_name = #{city} OR c.city_name = CONCAT(#{city}, '市') OR c.city_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%') OR #{city} LIKE CONCAT('%', c.city_name, '%') OR REPLACE(c.city_name, '市', '') = REPLACE(#{city}, '市', '') )

SELECT id, name, city_id, address, latitude, longitude, food_type, avg_price, intro, image_url, score, hot_score, is_recommend, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM food WHERE id = #{id} AND del_flag = 0
SELECT id, name, city_id, address, latitude, longitude, food_type, avg_price, intro, image_url, score, hot_score, is_recommend, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM food WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, name, city_id, address, latitude, longitude, food_type, avg_price, intro, image_url, score, hot_score, is_recommend, create_time, update_time, del_flag FROM food WHERE del_flag = 0 AND is_recommend = 1 ORDER BY hot_score DESC, score DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food (name, city_id, address, latitude, longitude, food_type, avg_price, intro, image_url, score, hot_score, is_recommend, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{name}, #{cityId}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{foodType}, #{avgPrice}, #{intro}, #{imageUrl}, #{score}, #{hotScore}, #{isRecommend}, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE food SET del_flag = 1, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND (del_flag = 0 OR del_flag IS NULL)
